category.name: wcf.acp.uzbot
category.item: Number of affected entries iaw condition: {$count}

This Bot monitors the modification or deletion of entries and sends a notification when somebody has edited or deleted an entry.

The author of the entry is affected user and can be directly addressed.


By configuration of general user conditions the monitoring can be limited to certain authors.


The following Bot-specific placeholders are available:

[action]Action executed by the user: “edited” or “deleted”
[count]Total number of modified / deleted entries (always 1)
[count-user]Number of entries of the affected user
[entry-id]ID of the modified entry
[entry-link]Link to the entry
[entry-subject]Title of entry
[entry-text]Text of entry in simplified formatting
[reason]Reason for the modification as given by the user
[changing-username]Name of the user changing / deleting the entry

The following general placeholders are available:

[date]Date of Bot execution
[time]Time of Bot execution
[page]Name of this website, as defined in ACP
[receiver]Username of the receiver of a notification

The following user-specific placeholders are available:

[user-age]Age of the user
[user-email]Email address of the user
[user-groups]Names of the user groups the user is member of
[user-id]ID of the user
[user-name]Name of the user
[user-profile]Link to the user’s profile
[@user-profile]Link to the user’s profile with notification (posts only)

This bot monitors the publication of entries and sends a notification when a user or guest has created a new entry and the entry is published / enabled.

The author of the entry is the affected user and can be directly addressed.


By configuring the general user conditions, specific users can be monitored.


The following Bot-specific placeholders are available:

[count]Total number of published entries (always 1)
[count-user]Number of entries created by the affected user
[entry-category]Category of the entry
[entry-link]Link to the entry
[entry-subject]Title of the entry
[entry-text]Text of the entry in simplified formatting

The following general placeholders are available:

[date]Date of Bot execution
[time]Time of Bot execution
[page]Name of this website, as defined in ACP
[receiver]Username of the receiver of a notification

The following user-specific placeholders are available:

[user-age]Age of the user
[user-email]Email address of the user
[user-groups]Names of the user groups the user is member of
[user-id]ID of the user
[user-name]Name of the user
[user-profile]Link to the user’s profile
[@user-profile]Link to the user’s profile with notification (posts only)
